00015 /*
00016  * Smell & Blood system
00017  * 
00018  * Smell and blood trails decay as time passes.  
00019  * 
00020  *             Decay Rate        Maximum Strength    Decay Time: Min Max (for biggest volume)
00021  *
00022  * Smell       1 per turn              31                         31  31
00023  * Blood    1 every 1-3 turns           7                          7  21
00024  *
00025  * Smell has a much finer resolution so that creatures which track by smell
00026  * can do so effectively.
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*
00030  * Time for some crazy-ass macros!
00031  * The smell byte is spit as follows:
00032  * O \
00033  * O  \
00034  * O   \ Smell
00035  * O   / Strength (only on ground)
00036  * O  /
00037  * O /
00038  * O >   Type of blood on roof
00039  * O >   Type of smell/blood on ground
00040  *
00041  * The blood byte is split as follows:
00042  * O \
00043  * O  > Blood quantity on roof
00044  * O /
00045  * O \ 
00046  * O  > Blood quantity on ground
00047  * O /
00048  * O \  Blood decay
00049  * O /  time (roof and ground decay together)
00050  */
00051 
00052 /*
00053  * In these defines,
00054  * s indicates the smell byte, b indicates the blood byte
00055  */
00056 
00057 // LUT for which graphic to use based on strength
00058 //                                                                                         0  1,  2,  3,  4,  5,  6, 7
00059 UINT8 ubBloodGraphicLUT [ ] = {  3, 3,  2,  2,  1,  1,  0, 0 };
00060 
00061 
00062 #define SMELL_STRENGTH_MAX          63
00063 #define BLOOD_STRENGTH_MAX          7
00064 #define BLOOD_DELAY_MAX       3
00065 
00066 #define SMELL_TYPE_BITS( s )  (s & 0x03)
00067 
00068 #define BLOOD_ROOF_TYPE( s )  (s & 0x02)
00069 #define BLOOD_FLOOR_TYPE( s ) (s & 0x01)
00070 
00071 #define BLOOD_ROOF_STRENGTH( b )    (b & 0xE0)
00072 #define BLOOD_FLOOR_STRENGTH( b )         ( (b & 0x1C) >> 2 )
00073 #define BLOOD_DELAY_TIME( b )                   (b & 0x03)
00074 #define NO_BLOOD_STRENGTH( b )                  ((b & 0xFC) == 0)
00075 
00076 #define DECAY_SMELL_STRENGTH( s ) \
00077 { \
00078       UINT8 ubStrength = SMELL_STRENGTH( (s) ); \
00079       ubStrength--; \
00080       ubStrength = ubStrength << SMELL_TYPE_NUM_BITS; \
00081       (s) = SMELL_TYPE_BITS( (s) ) | ubStrength; \
00082 }
00083 
00084 // s = smell byte
00085 // ns = new strength
00086 // ntf = new type on floor
00087 // Note that the first part of the macro is designed to
00088 // preserve the type value for the blood on the roof
00089 #define SET_SMELL( s, ns, ntf ) \
00090 { \
00091       (s) = (BLOOD_ROOF_TYPE( s )) | SMELL_TYPE( ntf ) | (ns << SMELL_TYPE_NUM_BITS); \
00092 }
00093 
00094 #define DECAY_BLOOD_DELAY_TIME( b ) \
00095 { \
00096       (b)--; \
00097 }
00098 
00099 #define SET_BLOOD_FLOOR_STRENGTH( b, nb ) \
00100 { \
00101       (b) = ( (nb) << 2 ) | ( (b) & 0xE3); \
00102 }
00103 
00104 #define SET_BLOOD_ROOF_STRENGTH( b, nb ) \
00105 { \
00106       (b) = BLOOD_FLOOR_STRENGTH( (nb) ) << 5 | ( (b) & 0x1F); \
00107 }
00108 
00109 #define DECAY_BLOOD_FLOOR_STRENGTH( b ) \
00110 { \
00111       UINT8 ubFloorStrength; \
00112       ubFloorStrength = BLOOD_FLOOR_STRENGTH( (b) ); \
00113       ubFloorStrength--; \
00114       SET_BLOOD_FLOOR_STRENGTH( b, ubFloorStrength ); \
00115 }
00116 
00117 #define DECAY_BLOOD_ROOF_STRENGTH( b ) \
00118 { \
00119       UINT8 ubRoofStrength; \
00120       ubRoofStrength = BLOOD_ROOF_STRENGTH( (b) ); \
00121       ubRoofStrength--; \
00122       SET_BLOOD_FLOOR_STRENGTH( b, ubRoofStrength ); \
00123 }
00124 
00125 #define SET_BLOOD_DELAY_TIME( b ) \
00126 { \
00127  (b) = BLOOD_DELAY_TIME( (UINT8) Random( BLOOD_DELAY_MAX ) + 1 ) | (b & 0xFC); \
00128 }
00129 
00130 #define SET_BLOOD_FLOOR_TYPE( s, ntg ) \
00131 { \
00132       (s) = BLOOD_FLOOR_TYPE( ntg ) | (s & 0xFE); \
00133 }
00134 
00135 #define SET_BLOOD_ROOF_TYPE( s, ntr ) \
00136 { \
00137       (s) = BLOOD_ROOF_TYPE( ntr ) | (s & 0xFD); \
00138 }

00174 void DecayBlood()
00175 {
00176       UINT32                              uiLoop;
00177       MAP_ELEMENT *           pMapElement;
00178 
00179       for (uiLoop = 0, pMapElement = gpWorldLevelData; uiLoop < WORLD_MAX; uiLoop++, pMapElement++)
00180       {
00181             if (pMapElement->ubBloodInfo)
00182             {
00183                   // delay blood timer!
00184                   DECAY_BLOOD_DELAY_TIME( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo );
00185                   if (BLOOD_DELAY_TIME( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo ) == 0)
00186                   {
00187                         // Set re-evaluate flag
00188                         pMapElement->uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_REEVALUATEBLOOD;
00189 
00190                         // reduce the floor blood strength if it is above zero
00191                         if (BLOOD_FLOOR_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo ) > 0)
00192                         {
00193                               DECAY_BLOOD_FLOOR_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo )
00194                               if (BLOOD_FLOOR_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo ) == 0)
00195                               {
00196                                     // delete the blood graphic on the floor!
00197                                     // then
00198                                     if (NO_BLOOD_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo ))
00199                                     {
00200                                           // wipe the whole byte to zero
00201                                           pMapElement->ubBloodInfo = 0;
00202                                     }
00203                               }
00204                         }
00205                         // reduce the roof blood strength if it is above zero
00206                         if (BLOOD_ROOF_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo ) > 0)
00207                         {
00208                               DECAY_BLOOD_ROOF_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo )
00209                               if (BLOOD_ROOF_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo ) == 0)
00210                               {
00211                                     // delete the blood graphic on the roof!
00212                                     if (NO_BLOOD_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo ))
00213                                     {
00214                                           // wipe the whole byte to zero
00215                                           pMapElement->ubBloodInfo = 0;                                     
00216                                     }
00217                               }
00218                         }
00219 
00220                         // if any blood remaining, reset time
00221                         if ( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo )
00222                         {
00223                               SET_BLOOD_DELAY_TIME( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo );
00224                         }
00225                   }
00226                   // end of blood handling
00227             }
00228 
00229             // now go on to the next gridno
00230       }

00233 void DecayBloodAndSmells( UINT32 uiTime )
00234 {
00235       UINT32                              uiCheckTime;
00236 
00237       if ( !gfWorldLoaded )
00238       {
00239             return;
00240       }
00241       
00242       // period between checks, in game seconds
00243       switch( giTimeCompressMode )
00244       {
00245             // in time compression, let this happen every 5 REAL seconds
00246             case TIME_COMPRESS_5MINS: // rate of 300 seconds per real second
00247                   uiCheckTime = 5 * 300;
00248                   break;
00249             case TIME_COMPRESS_30MINS: // rate of 1800 seconds per real second
00250                   uiCheckTime = 5 * 1800;
00251                   break;
00252             case TIME_COMPRESS_60MINS: // rate of 3600 seconds per real second
00253             case TIME_SUPER_COMPRESS: // should not be used but just in frigging case...
00254                   uiCheckTime = 5 * 3600;
00255                   break;
00256             default: // not compressing
00257                   uiCheckTime = 100;
00258                   break;
00259       }
00260 
00261       // ok so "uiDecayBloodLastUpdate" is a bit of a misnomer now
00262       if ( ( uiTime - gTacticalStatus.uiDecayBloodLastUpdate ) > uiCheckTime )
00263       {
00264             gTacticalStatus.uiDecayBloodLastUpdate = uiTime;
00265             DecayBlood();
00266             DecaySmells();
00267       }
00268 }

00270 void DropSmell( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00271 {
00272       MAP_ELEMENT *           pMapElement;
00273       UINT8                               ubOldSmell;
00274       UINT8                               ubOldStrength;
00275       UINT8                               ubSmell;
00276       UINT8                               ubStrength;
00277 
00278       /*
00279        *  Here we are creating a new smell on the ground.  If there is blood in
00280        *  the tile, it overrides dropping smells of any type
00281        */
00282 
00283       if (pSoldier->bLevel == 0)
00284       {
00285             pMapElement = &(gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo]);
00286             if (pMapElement->ubBloodInfo)
00287             {
00288                   // blood here, don't drop any smell
00289                   return;
00290             }
00291 
00292             if (pSoldier->bNormalSmell > pSoldier->bMonsterSmell)
00293             {
00294                   ubStrength = pSoldier->bNormalSmell - pSoldier->bMonsterSmell;
00295                   ubSmell = HUMAN;
00296             }
00297             else
00298             {
00299                   ubStrength = pSoldier->bMonsterSmell - pSoldier->bNormalSmell;
00300                   if (ubStrength == 0)
00301                   {
00302                         // don't drop any smell
00303                         return;
00304                   }
00305                   ubSmell = CREATURE_ON_FLOOR;
00306             }
00307 
00308             if (pMapElement->ubSmellInfo)
00309             {
00310                   // smell already exists here; check to see if it's the same or not
00311 
00312                   ubOldSmell = SMELL_TYPE( pMapElement->ubSmellInfo );
00313                   ubOldStrength = SMELL_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubSmellInfo );
00314                   if (ubOldSmell == ubSmell)
00315                   {
00316                         // same smell; increase the strength to the bigger of the two strengths,
00317                         // plus 1/5 of the smaller
00318                         ubStrength = __max( ubStrength, ubOldStrength ) + __min( ubStrength, ubOldStrength ) / 5;
00319                         ubStrength = __max( ubStrength, SMELL_STRENGTH_MAX );
00320                   }
00321                   else
00322                   {
00323                         // different smell; we muddy the smell by reducing the smell strength
00324                         if (ubOldStrength > ubStrength)
00325                         {
00326                               ubOldStrength -= ubStrength / 3;
00327                               SET_SMELL( pMapElement->ubSmellInfo, ubOldStrength, ubOldSmell );
00328                         }
00329                         else
00330                         {
00331                               ubStrength -= ubOldStrength / 3;
00332                               if (ubStrength > 0)
00333                               {
00334                                     SET_SMELL( pMapElement->ubSmellInfo, ubStrength, ubSmell );
00335                               }
00336                               else
00337                               {
00338                                     // smell reduced to 0 - wipe all info on it!
00339                                     pMapElement->ubSmellInfo = 0;
00340                               }
00341                         }
00342                   }
00343             }
00344             else
00345             {
00346                   // the simple case, dropping a smell in a location where there is none
00347                   SET_SMELL( pMapElement->ubSmellInfo, ubStrength, ubSmell );
00348             }
00349       }
00350       // otherwise skip dropping smell
00351 }

00354 void InternalDropBlood( INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel, UINT8 ubType, UINT8 ubStrength, INT8 bVisible )
00355 {
00356       MAP_ELEMENT *           pMapElement;
00357       UINT8                               ubOldStrength=0;
00358       UINT8                               ubNewStrength=0;
00359             
00360       /*
00361        * Dropping some blood;
00362        * We can check the type of blood by consulting the type in the smell byte
00363        */
00364 
00365       // If we are in water...
00366       if ( GetTerrainType( sGridNo ) == DEEP_WATER || GetTerrainType( sGridNo ) == LOW_WATER || GetTerrainType( sGridNo ) == MED_WATER )
00367       {
00368             return;
00369       }
00370 
00371       // ATE: Send warning if dropping blood nowhere....
00372       if ( sGridNo == NOWHERE )
00373       {
00374             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00375                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Attempting to drop blood NOWHERE" );
00376             #endif
00377             return;
00378       }
00379 
00380       // ensure max strength is okay
00381       ubStrength = __min( ubStrength, BLOOD_STRENGTH_MAX );
00382 
00383       pMapElement = &(gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ]);
00384       if ( bLevel == 0 )
00385       {
00386             // dropping blood on ground
00387             ubOldStrength = BLOOD_FLOOR_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo );
00388             if (ubOldStrength > 0)
00389             {
00390                   // blood already there... we'll leave the decay time as it is
00391                   if (BLOOD_FLOOR_TYPE( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo ) == ubType)
00392                   {
00393                         // combine blood strengths!
00394                         ubNewStrength = __min( ( ubOldStrength + ubStrength ), BLOOD_STRENGTH_MAX ); 
00395 
00396                         SET_BLOOD_FLOOR_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo, ubNewStrength );
00397                   }
00398                   else
00399                   {
00400                         // replace the existing blood if more is being dropped than exists
00401                         if (ubStrength > ubOldStrength )
00402                         {
00403                               // replace!
00404                               SET_BLOOD_FLOOR_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo, ubStrength );
00405                         }
00406                         // else we don't drop anything at all
00407                   }
00408             }
00409             else
00410             {
00411                   // no blood on the ground yet, so drop this amount!
00412                   // set decay time 
00413                   SET_BLOOD_DELAY_TIME( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo );
00414                   SET_BLOOD_FLOOR_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo, ubStrength );
00415                   // NB blood floor type stored in smell byte!
00416                   SET_BLOOD_FLOOR_TYPE( pMapElement->ubSmellInfo, ubType );
00417             }
00418       }
00419       else
00420       {
00421             // dropping blood on roof
00422             ubOldStrength = BLOOD_ROOF_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo );
00423             if (ubOldStrength > 0)
00424             {
00425                   // blood already there... we'll leave the decay time as it is
00426                   if (BLOOD_ROOF_TYPE( pMapElement->ubSmellInfo ) == ubType)
00427                   {
00428                         // combine blood strengths!
00429                         ubNewStrength = __max( ubOldStrength, ubStrength ) + 1;           
00430                         // make sure the strength is legal        
00431                         ubNewStrength = __max( ubNewStrength, BLOOD_STRENGTH_MAX );
00432                         SET_BLOOD_ROOF_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo, ubNewStrength );
00433                   }
00434                   else
00435                   {
00436                         // replace the existing blood if more is being dropped than exists
00437                         if (ubStrength > ubOldStrength )
00438                         {
00439                               // replace!
00440                               SET_BLOOD_ROOF_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo, ubStrength );
00441                         }
00442                         // else we don't drop anything at all
00443                   }
00444             }
00445             else
00446             {
00447                   // no blood on the roof yet, so drop this amount!
00448                   // set decay time 
00449                   SET_BLOOD_DELAY_TIME( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo );
00450                   SET_BLOOD_ROOF_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo, ubNewStrength );
00451                   SET_BLOOD_ROOF_TYPE( pMapElement->ubSmellInfo, ubType );
00452             }
00453       }
00454 
00455       // Turn on flag...
00456       pMapElement->uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_REEVALUATEBLOOD;
00457 
00458       if ( bVisible != -1 )
00459       {
00460             UpdateBloodGraphics( sGridNo, bLevel );
00461       }
00462 
00463 }

00500 void UpdateBloodGraphics( INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel )
00501 {
00502       MAP_ELEMENT *           pMapElement;
00503       INT8                                bValue;
00504       UINT16                              usIndex, usNewIndex;
00505       
00506       // OK, based on level, type, display graphics for blood
00507       pMapElement = &(gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ]);
00508 
00509       // CHECK FOR BLOOD OPTION
00510       if ( !gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE ] )
00511       {
00512             return;
00513       }
00514 
00515       if ( pMapElement->uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REEVALUATEBLOOD )
00516       {
00517 
00518             // Turn off flag!
00519             pMapElement->uiFlags &= ( ~MAPELEMENT_REEVALUATEBLOOD );
00520 
00521             // Ground
00522             if ( bLevel == 0 )
00523             {
00524                   bValue = BLOOD_FLOOR_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubBloodInfo );
00525             
00526                   // OK, remove tile graphic if one exists....
00527                   if ( TypeRangeExistsInObjectLayer( sGridNo, HUMANBLOOD, CREATUREBLOOD, &usIndex ) )
00528                   {
00529                         //This has been removed and it is handled by the ubBloodInfo level when restoring a saved game.
00530                         //Set a flag indicating that the following changes are to go the the maps temp file
00531                         //ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( TRUE );
00532 
00533                         // Remove
00534                         RemoveObject( sGridNo, usIndex );
00535 
00536                         //ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( FALSE );
00537                   }
00538 
00539                   // OK, pick new one. based on strength and randomness
00540 
00541                   if ( bValue > 0 )
00542                   {
00543                         usIndex = (UINT16)( ( Random( 4 ) * 4 ) + ubBloodGraphicLUT[ bValue ] );
00544 
00545                         if ( BLOOD_FLOOR_TYPE( pMapElement->ubSmellInfo )     == 0 )
00546                         {
00547                               GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( HUMANBLOOD, (UINT16)(usIndex + 1), &usNewIndex );

00549                         else

00551                               GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( CREATUREBLOOD, (UINT16)(usIndex + 1), &usNewIndex );

00555                         //Set a flag indicating that the following changes are to go the the maps temp file

00560 
00561                         //ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( FALSE );
